name: Pop Music
description:
Pop Music is a musical sandbox with no objective other than to chill out and make some fun sounds.

Create, combine, split, launch, and pop bubbles to generate an evolving ambient soundscape. Bubbles play a note when they bounce off the edge of the screen, and bigger bubbles play deeper notes. Use your mouse to interact, or look to the bottom right for a more retro option.

Made in 48 hours for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam.

Known issues:

  • Clicking outside the game can cause you to lose keyboard control. Refreshing the page should fix it.
